snippet: Two United States Navy sailors were arrested on Tuesday on suspicion of raping a woman in Okinawa, an episode likely to further fan anger over the presence of a large American base there.
abstract: Two United States Navy sailors are arrested on suspicion of raping a woman in Okinawa,  episode likely to further incite anger over presence of large American base there; crimes by American servicemen have been a longstanding complaint of Okinawans.
lead_paragraph: Two United States Navy sailors were arrested on Tuesday on suspicion of raping a woman in Okinawa, an episode likely to further fan anger over the presence of a large American base there.

headline.seo: 2 U.S. Sailors Arrested in Okinawa Rape Case
headline.main: Arrests of 2 U.S. Sailors in Rape Case Threaten to Fan Okinawa’s Anger
headline.print_headline: Arrests of 2 U.S. Sailors in Rape Case Threaten to Fan Okinawa’s Anger
